title: The Achievers: A Personal Success Handbook
description: Would you like to know how do some people become achievers and lead highly rewarding lives? Achievers are ordinary people, just like you. What sets them apart from others is what they do. Some achievers are born with talent, but equally some talented people never achieve much, it all comes down to behaviour. There are Achievers in every walk of life. Business or Sport, Arts or Sciences, Invention, Psychology or Religion. They all follow well defined paths to their Goals. This books highlights and explains the habits, thoughts and attitudes that define achievers. What you will master is not mere theory, it is the practices that have been ingrained into people who have become top achievers by coaches such as the author himself. Here is a template that anyone can follow to make themselves into an achiever in whatever field of endeavour they choose to pursue.
author: David Ferrers
